description: Storage layer metrics including latencies for loading views, chains, contracts, and services, plus I/O operation rates

panels.description: Time to load chain state from storage. p50 is median, p90 is most users' experience, p99 captures tail latency.
panels.title: Load Chain Latency

panels.description: Time to load a contract from storage. p50 is median, p90 is most users' experience, p99 captures tail latency.
panels.title: Load Contract Latency

panels.description: Time to load a service from storage. p50 is median, p90 is most users' experience, p99 captures tail latency.
panels.title: Load Service Latency

panels.description: Time to read a certificate from storage
panels.title: Read Certificate Latency

panels.title: Read Blob Latency

panels.title: Write Blob Latency

panels.description: Time to read an event from storage
panels.title: Read Event Latency

panels.description: Time to write events to storage
panels.title: Write Event Latency

panels.description: Time to write a batch to storage
panels.title: Write Batch Latency

panels.description: Time to check if a certificate exists in storage
panels.title: Contains Certificate Latency

panels.description: Time to check if a blob exists in storage
panels.title: Contains Blob Latency

panels.description: Time to check if an event exists in storage
panels.title: Contains Event Latency
